title: Mozilla shares how it plans to implement Manifest V3 in Firefox
content:
Mozilla has revealed how it plans to adopt Manifest V3 in Firefox. The company says Firefox will fully embrace the next iteration of the web extension platform by the end of 2022, and in the lead-up to that, it’s launching a new developer preview program to gather feedback from web developers. What is Manifest V3?

The post Mozilla shares how it plans to implement Manifest V3 in Firefox appeared first on XDA.
description: Mozilla has outlined its next steps for implementing Manifest V3 in Firefox. The company says it will take a different approach than Chrome.
